channel.title: Hackathons on WWCode ATX
channel.description: Recent content in Hackathons on WWCode ATX

item.title: 6th ATX Diversity Hackathon Rules and Judging criteria
item.description: Prize Categories There are the five categories for prizes. All projects are automatically entered into all categories. Deep learning - Sponsored by Bestow UI/UX - Sponsored by The Zebra Social impact - Sponsored by Athena Health Technical stack - Sponsored by Athena Health Overall - Sponsored by Athena Health Assembling Your Team The max team size is 5 people. You can organize your own team. If you are looking for projects or teammates, please sign up for slack here and use the #pitch channel.

item.title: 6th ATX Diversity Hackathon Workshop Schedule
item.description: FRIDAY, September 18 11:00 - 12:00 PM: Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion can’t be just terms that we use at work Presenter: Briona Jenkins [twitter instagram] Visit Briona’s press page to listen to the panels and podcast, and the blog posts. 12:00 - 1:00 PM: How to Not Die Broke: Investing Strategies You Need to Know Presenter: Kara Perez [twitter instagram] 1:00 - 2:00 PM: Communicating with Diagrams: A designer’s tips for creating engineering diagrams that clearly & efficiently convey their intended message Presenter: Sara Wells

item.title: Women Who Code Austin 6th Annual Diversity Hackathon Sign up
item.description: Join Women Who Code Austin (ATX) for our 6th annual Diversity Hackathon, sponsored by Google Fiber, Athena Health, Bestow and the Zebra. This is a virtual hackathon, with online workshops. When: Fri, Sep 18, 2020, 9:00 AM – Sun, Sep 20, 2020, 5:00 PM CDT Registration: sign up here This hackathon is a celebration of diversity. Anyone who supports diversity is welcome — no matter your level of technical knowledge.
